nodes.text: Bad Motivator IPA was an alcoholic beverage served at Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY. The drink was suitable for human consumption. Eloc Throno, author of the Traveler's Guide to Batuu, considered it to be one of the most flavorful beers on tap at the cantina.

Bad Motivator IPA is an India pale ale available on tap to customers at the Oga's Cantina bar in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened in 2019. It was revealed as part of a large promotional event held on February 26, 2019. The drink is named for the "red" droid R5-D4 that Owen Lars almost purchased in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. When the droid displayed a "bad motivator," Lars purchased R2-D2 instead.

Bad Motivator IPA is brewed by Sierra Nevada Brewing Company, an independent brewery based in Chico, California. It has an ABV of 6.0%, and its menu description reads, "Tropical India Pale Ale with galaxy and comet hops."
